rev.desc.rev.desc: Added $L.svc.cart.item parameter in call.connector panel to be passed to svcCat.init.interface since the cart item parameter was added to the svcCat.init.interface Rad application. This is mainly due to providing the cart item info for external web service.
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added call to billing after call to generate explines.
Changed panel set in trigger.incidents.after.update to set operator in $L.cmlabor=operator() instead of operator in $L.cmlabor=opened.by in $L.file
Switched error message to include last panel executed.
Added message to the error exit so that we will have some indication that there was a problem.
Only cut expense lines if module is enabled

descript.descript: Added $L.svc.cart.item parameter in call.connector panel to be passed to svcCat.init.interface since the cart item parameter was added to the svcCat.init.interface Rad application. This is mainly due to providing the cart item info for external web service.
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added call to billing after call to generate explines.
Changed panel set in trigger.incidents.after.update to set operator in $L.cmlabor=operator() instead of operator in $L.cmlabor=opened.by in $L.file
Switched error message to include last panel executed.
Added message to the error exit so that we will have some indication that there was a problem.
Only cut expense lines if module is enabled
If the call is not closed then set first.call=false
